plot: It's Christmas. Rick shrinks Morty, injecting him into a homeless man to save Anatomy Park. Jerry tries to have a Christmas free of electronic devices, but regrets his decision when his parents introduce him to their new friend.

Jerry invites his parents over for Christmas dinner with the family, but realizes that, in the time since he last saw them, they've developed a strange relationship with a boy named Jacob. Rick gives a homeless man named Reuben a "health check", and Morty is injected into his body to fix an amusement park that Rick built in there.
